subject: Greetings
author: tim_woolworth
full_text:
I have replied to a few posts here in the past and I intend to do so with much more regularity now.  I have come to the realization that skeptics cannot be avoided and my audio needs to get out there for feedback.

For those who don't know me, my name is Tim Woolworth.  I have been (sigh) a ghost hunter for years.  I discovered ITC a couple of years ago  and I was relegated to using a Shack Hack until 6 or 7 months ago.  At that time, a Minibox Plus found its way to me and my view of ITC and the afterlife has changed entirely.  Since I have been practicing ITC, ghost hunting just isn't that much fun anymore.

I now do sessions about three times a week.  I have been keeping my audio clips to myself until now.  I have posted clips on other boards and I almost never get replies.  One thing I have noticed about this group is that everyone is good at listening to clips and responding so I decided to start posting only at this forum instead of the others.  

I have started a folder today.  The clips put in there are from last night.  I recorded a ten minute session after writing the reply to the skeptic last night.  These are five short clips, and a transcript, from that session which had activity the entire time.  The clips include konstantin Raudive, the Others talking about using the Ghost Boxes, a warning for me, and my new favorite clip: a rapper comes through at the end to say good-bye.

Thank you for listening.

http://tech.groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Tim%20Woolworth/June%202010/

Tim W.
